评论详情: Definitely love the shirt. It’s definitely hard to find this pattern. I don’t know if the pattern is what adds to the price but I like it all the more. True to size.
Feels nice and fits just right. Good quality material and well stitched. I will be buying more from this vendor. And for the price well worth the money.

I bought this shirt for my hubby.  He likes to wear shirts that are little more noticeable and at first glance, he thought this one was too busy.  I convinced him he looked good in it and from the first night he wore it, he’s received so many compliments from both men and women!  The ladies like the silky feel of the material and the guys are jealous so, they want one too.  lol.  The sizing is true to size and it washes very well.

This shirt is awesome . The print , the craftsmanship , the quality , everything is there . I am 5.10” 256 men with a belly . I ordered 3x and it fits perfectly . The only issue I have , which is not a big deal at all , it is slightly shorter then i would like if i don’t tuck it in . Well , with this kind of shirts , you dont wanna do that . But also it should be considered that i have a belly and if i loose that , it will be perfect fit . It came in a vacuumed bag . As soon as i took it out and ironed , it came to life . Ironing is very easy . It even have hidden button closure . Well done . It feels almost silky , good quality material . I am very happy with this shirt . Got so many compliments when I wear . Well worth the price tag .
My husband liked everything about the shirt you got to be a man’s man to wear this shirt have confidence

评论概述: Great for holiday parties, the colors remind me of a Maxfield Parrish painting.
评论详情: If you don't know who the artist referred to might be, he did at least one picture used for a Moody Blues cover, with lots of blue and gold. The shirt is properly fitting size-wise. No complaints. I don't usually give 5 stars unless the item is just fantastic. This is a good but not great shirt, so...4 stars.

I ordered the GSBOGOSSE Men's Floral Golden Lion with Paisley Long Sleeve Button-Down Retro Shirt for my son, who loves this style. I selected a size large to fit his 6'1", 185 lb frame, which fit perfectly and true to size. The material is soft and very comfortable to wear. He likes it and has received many compliments on it. I like that it washed easily and came out of the dryer without many wrinkles!

评论概述: Great look, OK quality, weird sizing
评论详情: This is an attractive shirt with a silky texture. It will look great to wear as a wedding guest. However, the fabric is not breathable. The seams are OK, but it had a LOT of loose threads after the first washing. The sizing is weird. I have a 49" chest so I followed the size chart and ordered a 2XL. It fits me nicely in the chest, back, and shoulders, but the sleeves are too long, the collar is a bit snug (I have a 20" neck), and the wrists are a bit tight.

This is a well fitted shirt and has a very nice feel to the fabric. Unfortunately the shirt came in a shrink pack and the folds in the shirt didn't want to come out. The fabric is likely safe for an iron but the texture worried me so I used a steamer to much success. A good shirt but not a 5 star shirt for the reasons I mentioned.
Nice on arrival, but a bit smaller than my size. Besides that no complaints

评论概述: Silky smooth with a luxurious sheen
评论详情: The golds are a bit brighter than the pictures, but the shirt itself is very shiny and has a silk-like sheen that makes it look silky smooth despite it being polyester. It came with a branded hang tag although the shirt itself it not branded, so a third party manufacturer is likely. There are also warnings of color shifts and dye leakage when washing, so the dyes and fabrics are likely not of exceptional quality.
The orangish color really pops out.  Nice soft feel.  However, it does run a little small for me.  Get the next size up just in case
Great fit!!!! High quality!!! Shiny and silky!!! Great color resolution!!! Great value for money!!!! Very luxurious!!!

I ordered the GSBOGOOSE shirt for a special occasion. The fabric has a soft feel to it and it is very comfortable. The colors are very sharp and are exactly as advertised in the product photos. There were no defects on the shirt when it arrived, and it came nicely folded. The stitching is done very well, with no loose threads or loose buttons. I found this shirt to be true to size.

My husband loves shirts that are out of the ordinary. When I saw this shirt online I knew he would just love it. When I received it and opened  the package I was so disappointed in the fabric and workmanship of the shirt. The fabric is tissue thin and appears to be see through. I chose this shirt to give him for the his birthday but i don’t that will be the case.
This is the kind of shirt you can only wear once a year, but it feels great.

评论概述: Super shiny shirt - the pattern is starfish/coral, not floral
评论详情: The first thing I noticed was how shiny the shirt was, even the black. I'm not sure if it makes it look more expensive or cheap. The pattern is very bold - but mine had starfish on it, not flowers.
I feel like this is something udai hussain would wear...but i mean that in a good way because he wore dope clothing.  This shirt is just cool!!

评论概述: Very nice shirt, a little too blousey looking for me.
评论详情: High quality, nice enough looking shirt in pictures.  Fit is good and it seems well made.  I ordered for an upcoming cruise, but after receiving the shirt it is a bit more blousey looking than I am comfotable with - in fact I double checked which side it buttoned on to make sure.  Perhaps if I played guitar and was Prince it would be right for me, but as it is, this is a little too much.  If you are thinking about the shirt, it's quality and workmanship are excellent, the print is quite vibrant and nice looking, and if you feel you can pull off something like this it will be a great choice I am sure - it's just a little too much for me.

I have been very pleased with the look, style, feel of this shirt.  Not just a casual button shirt.  It looks amazing!  I do wear nice shirts form time to time and rarely get the kind of compliments I got with this shirt!  The patterns are really cool.  It's worth the price.
Fits great, looks great, good clubbing type shirt or just for looking way cool at work!  I like the material and it is good to go right out of the dryer.  You will love this

I wore this shirt for the first time on a Carribean Thanksgiving cruise recently. It was very comfortable, and the large size fit my 5'9", 195 lb. frame perfectly. The quality of the shirt is excellent, and the pattern was perfect for my use. I had numerous compliments as I moved about the ship. I live in a retirement area, and this is excellent for casual occasions.

I wore this shirt to a family gathering, and it definitely stands out. The print is bold, with vibrant patterns that catch the eye. The fabric is soft enough, but a little heavier than I expected for a long sleeve shirt.  The fit is okay, not too tight, but not overly loose either. I didn’t love the way it felt after wearing it for a few hours, but the shirt’s style is the main thing people noticed. It’s a statement piece, so if you're into bold patterns, it might work, but it's not something I’d reach for regularly.

评论概述: Stylish long sleeve "Dressy" shirt made of thick silky synthetic fabric.
评论详情: This Mens Paisley printed long sleeve dress shirt has a soft silky feel but it is a very thick and sturdy kind of fabric that was a little off putting at first. I washed it and it seemed to be a bit softer but the colors were still perfect.  I found this shirt to be true to size and it is very comfortable but there were many threads I had to cut off of it which surprised me for a shirt at this price point but it was a very easy fix to snip the threads. I can imagine wearing this shirt for a special date or party but its not the kind of shirt I would consider for a truly formal occasion but that is subjective. Overall its a great shirt. I think this is a beautiful shirt and I believe it will also be a long lasting shirt that will not likely fade when cared for properly.

评论概述: Beware of this shirt I received mine with ugly white line
评论详情: When I received the package it didn't look anything wrong with the shirt but when I opened it I realized when they made it they made mistake when they first made the shirt and they left an ugly white line at the lower middle of the shirt right in the middle of the black line of the buttons I added pictures to see I am returning it for another shirt replacement and hopefully the new one will not have such a thing I also added in the pictures screenshot of the shirt description to see how different it is from the one I received I also added closer pictures of the uneven white line I am just glad the shirt was for me and it wasn't a gift to someone in which of course I would gift it packaged. If you decide to buy it make sure you open it as soon as you receive it also keep in mind because it arrives compressed inside a package the fold marks would not go away at your home iron you have to take it to a professional press machine first to get the fold marks away before wearing it for the first time. I also saw other people complained about the colors which is also true if you look at the yellow in the picture I took it's not as the same gold yellow they showed me in the picture. I hope this review is helpful

Nice shirt, decently comfortable.  If you are debating between sizes, go with the larger one.  The tails do not go down as far as expected based on the product photos; maybe just a long torso, or maybe because of the larger size, but it's more like belt-level.  It is a bit tight in the chest and arms but not so much that I can't wear it, just snug.  The printed design is fun and loud; nice bold colors and strong contrast.
This is a beautiful shirt and the black/gold colors complement each other greatly.
Excellent quality, great material and thick. It's very nice 😀
I was surprised by the quality of the shirt. Looks like good quality. Will be wearing soon for update. There were a few strings/strands hanging.
The size fits my my husband good 👍🏽 very soft material eye catching great quality material very flattering to the eye 👁️ 👍🏽 love the design
The design and comfort of the shirt is really good and I like how it looks on me. I like the bold colors and it looks good with a pair of slacks or jeans great fit.
Very soft fabric, and fits as described

评论概述: A little overwhelming, but still cool.
评论详情: I would not wear this type of shirt every day, but for casual summer environments it's a great fit. Very soft and light weight, perfect for warm summer casual occasions. Quality workmanship makes this a very nice shirt.

评论概述: A flashy shirt, sleeves just barely long enough, body on the XL is shorter than normal US sizes
评论详情: This will be ok but runs small vs normal US sizes. It's about 2 inches short in the body (made in China) compared to average US sizes.  The XL sleeves are equal to a 35-36" length. If you're 6ft or more then the XL will barely be enough.  The fabric is soft and the stitching seems better than some we see from overseas. It's not dress shirt level but appears adequate.  It's a bold pattern but runs slightly small in length, width and height so I can probably only wear it once. If it shrinks at all in the wash then it'll be done.  It came vacuum packed and looked like a flat little board at first.  Ideally it needs to be 10- 15% larger in all directions to match normal US sizes.  Sturdier material and thread would help also but the overall first impression is it's fine other than running a bit small.

These printed dress shirts bring a unique, eye-catching style to any wardrobe with their bold designs and comfortable fit. They’ve garnered plenty of praise for their vibrant patterns, soft fabric, and versatility.  Pros: Stylish Design:  Many reviewers admired the gorgeous patterns, noting that they drew numerous compliments. The designs are retro, luxurious, and ideal for events or outings. The patterns are vibrant and make a statement, whether worn casually or for special occasions. Comfort and Fit:  The fabric is soft and true to size, with a comfortable fit praised by multiple buyers. Perfect for warmer climates like Florida, where the lightweight material is ideal. Fits well across various body types, with sizes ranging from medium to 3XL. Versatility:  Suitable for church, dinners, dancing, or even everyday wear. Several reviewers mentioned wearing these shirts for events, casual outings, or special occasions. Durable Material:  The material quality and stitching were highly rated. Reviewers in Mexico highlighted the excellent fabric and tailoring. Cons: Breathability:  One reviewer noted that the fabric lacked breathability, which might not be ideal for extremely hot or active environments. Occasional Delays:  Although unrelated to product quality, a reviewer emphasized their satisfaction with timely delivery and proper packaging, indicating potential concerns if expectations aren’t met. Varied Use Cases:  While suitable for most events, the shirts may feel too bold or casual for formal settings unless paired strategically. Overall Impression: These printed shirts are a standout for those who enjoy bold, unique patterns and comfortable fits. They are versatile enough for casual and semi-formal occasions, offering great value and style. Minor concerns like fabric breathability may arise, but overall, these shirts deliver both quality and compliments. :)

When I ordered this shirt I thought it was white but it is clearly powder blue, red, and white. I need to look harder when I order stuff. The 4XL fits me just right except it could be a little longer. My belly could be a little smaller as well and it would fit better. I don't want to steer anyone the wrong way but I would suggest ordering up a size. I think the shirt itself is a nice shirt and very shiny, more so than I expected. I can't find washing instructions so I'm not sure how washing it will affect wear and tear. With my big gut I probably shouldn't wear this shirt, maybe if there was a 5XL, but it's hard enough to find 4XL.

This shirt is well-talored, as expected for the premium price. There is a button flap and the fabric is very nice. I like this design but there are a variety to choose from. Not sure about washing as I would defer to professional clean/press. Not something to wear everyday- unless you live in Hollywood and are a professional Hippie ! Please excuse the model- I was trying to display the shirt as worn.
This shirt is lightweight, colorful and fits true to size. It was tried on straight out of the package but will be very nice to wear out once it is ironed.

评论概述: Beautiful quality shirt with high quality stylish print
评论详情: I'm a big social dancer (ballroom, swing, latin) and I really enjoy wearing something special to the dances I attend. This vendor had so many beautiful variations it was hard to make a choice. In the end I went with the Golden Lion/Paisley and it is fantastic.  This just a really elegant design and I have to say it's been a long time since I got so many complements on a shirt I was wearing. Dance obviously can be a pretty physical activity. That's to say that this shirt was a bit on the warm side. Not serious though. I can really work up a sweat and I made it through the whole dance (three hours) and still wasn't too hot.  This was very comfortable to wear and had three buttons on the cuffs making for a perfect fit for different size wrists. Oh and the sizing was spot on. Received exactly the fit I was expecting.  Now that I know what a quality item this vendor puts out I'm planning on picking up a couple more of these great designs. Very satisfied.
Very Nice shirt. Fits well and looks good. He likes the way it feels and it fits his overall style as well.

评论概述: Great ornate patterns; vintage old school clubbing shirt vibe.
评论详情: I ordered this Men Floral/Golden Lion/Paisley/Fashion Luxury Printed Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Button-Down shirt for my teenage son, who saw it and loved it.My son loves midcentury menswear; he wears a suit or coat and tie to high school every day.  He tends to prefer preppie styles, so I was surprised that he liked this.  He said it was very 80s-90s, and it does remind me of the kind of shirt guys wore in the clubs in the 90s, sort of a Versace look.The fabric is a blend of 98% polyester/2% spandex, and is soft and has a sort of flow.  The cut is similar to a man button down business shirt, but the soft fabric and ornate design give it a very different feeling.The design on this shirt combines a sky blue background and intricate patterns in gold, white, and black.  The front of the shirt is patterned with chains, scallops, and fanciful, curved, leaf designs.  The back of the shirt is white; it has a large golden and black chalice with a lion’s head on either side, pale blue Greek Key designs, more of the gold chains and leaves, and more.I’ll admit it; this isn’t exactly my style, but my son really loves it.  He’s right; it does have a very old school, vintage feel.  And though it is far from his usual style, he looks great in this shirt.  He has pale skin and dark hair and eyes; the colors are flattering to his coloring.My son is just under 6’ tall and weighs about 200 pounds.  He has a broad chest and shoulders.  He usually wears a size 44 jacket; he likes his clothing a little loose, for comfort.  I ordered him a size XL shirt because the size chart said the chest measurement was 45.7”.  This fits him the way he prefers; with a little extra room.

评论概述: If he feels good, I feel good
评论详情: This is a very nice shirt…feels wonderful.  I ordered it for my mate.  The large fit fine.  He’s 183 lbs and 5’11”.  Even sitting, it still fit great.  Very classy shirt.  The sewmanship is good; has hidden buttons in front.  Cuff has the adjustment if you have little (or big) wrists.  This shirt is actually machine washable.  I’ll be using a delicate setting.  He’s excited to wear it for the upcoming holidays.  If he looks good and feels good, I definitely feel good.
Size is great, silky feel and look great

评论用户: Oxford Nordberg - Christians Only Clothing Co.
评论概述: Looks better real than in the pic
评论详情: My wife thought this was going to be way to loud, however, when I put it on she loved it.  Fits my personality perfectly. the material is great, the buttons are very nice.  I like how the buttons are covered up after being buttoned. This is a warm shirt, it was 47 degrees when I put it on and it kept me warm.It is smaller than normal.  I got a 4XL thinking it would be loose, but it wasn't, tighter than I wanted.  The sleeves are very long, I had to fold them up, maybe I have short arms.
This is a Great Quality 👌 Beautiful 🌹 Mens Dress Shirt 👔 Material is well made 👌 & love ❤️ The Satin feel ❤️ 😍 I Recommend This Product 👍

This is an ostentatious fashion statement of a shirt, but that is its main attraction. It takes its design cues from some of Gianni Versace’s bolder 90’s designs, and it is fun to wear.  The shirt is nothing special in its construction: not the worst I’ve seen, but fairly cheap feeling. Nonetheless, you wouldn’t get this shirt for the attention to sewing detail, so that’s not much of an issue.  New Year’s Eve is just about a month away, and that’s one of a few occasions when this shirt will be the perfect thing to wear.
Its nice . Not thrilled with it but its ok
This fashionable, mens long sleeve shirt is suitable for dress or play. Its fabric is lightweight, and comfortable to wear.

This shirt is so fancy it made me rethink my entire wardrobe and possibly my life choices. The 98% polyester and 2% spandex combo feels like wearing a hug from a cloud, while the paisley design screams “I know what I’m doing” (even if I don’t). The high neck and long sleeves give off sophisticated vibes, perfect for anything from brunch to hosting a mysterious soirée. It’s imported, so you can casually mention that when someone compliments you, bonus points if you say it in a terrible fake accent. Honestly, for a shirt that looks and feels this good, I might have to start introducing myself as a “luxury individual.”

评论概述: Fits to size, fun and creative, comfortable, attractive.
评论详情: Men Floral/Golden Lion/Paisley/Fashion Luxury Printed Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Button-Down Retro Gorgeous Design Shirts.  This shirt is a beauty.  It fits to size so the sizing is done well.  It can be worn to dress up or go casual.  Wear it to work easily, or for play time and get many compliments.  It buttons down the front and has long sleeves that can be rolled up if so desired.  It's even a good bowling shirt.  It's fun, creative, fits well, and cleans easily.  Keeps you warm on a cold day, yet cool on a hot one.  It doesn't seem to wrinkle so no worrying about ironing it.  I recommend this item.

评论概述: Good fit, great looks, cheap manufacture
评论详情: I usually have issues with the chinese made shirts and sleeve length. I order up two sizes to get the sleeves to fit, and just live with the extra bulk in the torso. Sleeves were a bit longer on this one, I could have gotten away with ordering up one size. It hangs nicely.  It was shipped vacuum sealed in a bag that was zip locked in another bag, placed into a shipping bag and mailed. (I guess they get a kick-back on plastic bags?) so it had deep-set wrinkles on arrival. Took some time with a steamer to get them all to fall out.  Love the pattern and the look of the shirt. The fabric has a nice sheen and is very light-weight.  Sadly, the construction/sewing is very low quality. There are lots of loose stitching and ragged ends under the armpits. The fabric was already picked in the front about the middle of the torso.  I wasn't expecting great quality at the price of the shirt, but would have like a bit nicer. I expect to get a few wears out of it before it falls apart. Hopefully I will be surprised.

The GSBOGOSSE Printed Dress Shirt is the very best silky party shirt imaginable. The video shows the perfect fit. Notice the collar with full button down, button sleeves and awesome Baroque printed artistry. Nice!  As you can see, the GSBOGOSSE Printed Dress Shirt is quality. Notice how the buttons are concealed with fold over for a clean, sophisticated style. The graphics are colorful, detailed and classically-inspired for an upscale look. The silk-like sheen of the materials is luxurious. I like that.  I highly recommend GSBOGOSSE’s excellent Printed Dress Shirt to everyone.

The reviews were good and did not bother to check the lower rated ones and I wish I had done so.  The material doesn't breathe and in summer this was going to be hard to wear if you start sweating.  Also I got a large despite being a medium sized person and this was a tight fit.  Needed to wear an inside vest as the material is like plastic and was scratching against the body. I got this unique shirt for my man. It is a good fit on him, it is slightly stretchable too. The stitching is great quality. The colors and printing make it very unique. It is a very light weight shiny material. This shirt is comfortable to wear. It has value for money. The polyester fabric and printing is good quality. This shirt, made from silky polyester material, is a vibrant and stylish fashion choice with bold colors. It fits true to size in a men's XL, ensuring a comfortable and flattering fit. Perfect, I will continúa 2 buy for this company

评论概述: The Most Unique Shirt I Own
评论详情: I received the multi-103 version in large.  The pictures in the advertisement are a good representation, but just wait until you actually see this for real.  It’s bold.  It’s ultra-comfortable.  It’s a statement!  The quality of the manufacturing process is visible throughout.  Every little nuance in the design is meticulously sewn.  The fit is very true-to-size and provides for just enough stretch if needed.  The sleeve length is just right.  There are no collar stays, but that’s not a problem because it stays true to form.  It is safe to put in the washer and dryer on low setting.  Overall, this is a uniquely designed, well manufactured shirt.  It is expensive, but if this is your type of thing, it is money well spent.

This shirt is made with nice soft material that has a good weight. It feels silky, yet still breathable. It says it is made of 98% silky polyester 2% elastane. There is some give in the material, but overall it is like a smooth satin. The fit seems to be as described. The shirt seems well made overall with nice quality collar and cuffs. not too floppy and not too stiff. It is a great shirt, definitely for special occasions. I like it and would recommend it.
Looks so good on my son. It fits his frame well. I like the designs on the shirt. Fancy without being too fancy.

I got this shirt for my teenage son. He said he needed/wanted this shirt for a “party” shirt. He says it is comfy and likes it, however, it doesn’t breathe well. He went to a dance and was soaked in sweat within the first couple hours. It washes and irons well (we did not put it in the dryer, just hung it up to dry) He is 5’ 6” and has a slender build. The small fits well with a little room to grow (which teenage boys do every 5 min😁).

I wasn’t initially appealed by the color of this shirt. There’s something about that brown that didn’t really work for me. Fortunately I was able to match it and it does look nice. The material is silky but not thin. It fits, fitted as well. In person the color is very rich and vibrant. Not a bad shirt. Love the texture.

This is really a nice shirt that obviously resembles a Versace shirt, but you can wear it with grace, knowing you paid less for the 'look' than you would have paid if it were an original. It's a great feel and fit, as well.

W This is a stunning shirt, It looks quite amazing. I love the design. The color is just as vibrant, if not more in real life than the picture. What is classy and sets you a part. Not too far formal looking, so I feel comfortable wearing it for everyday, But it does look great. Even for a formal event, he would look great.  The fabric is great quality, The outside is super soft and smooth. But the inside is not quite as soft, And It seems like a little itchy on the inside next to my skin. Not like super noticeable, Put if I pay attention to it. I can feel it. But if I get busy and forget about it, it doesn't bother me. It's a little weird. Nothing too bad, I'll still wear this. I thought it would go away after a washed it, but it didn't, Maybe several washings is what it needs.  It fits as expected and is easy to button up. The sleeves are the correct length not too long, or too short.  Overall recommend this, Just might wanna try it on. See if the sleeves itch, bother you or not.

评论概述: Another amazing shirt from this company
评论详情: This is the fourth shirt from this brand that I've ordered, and I am very happy with it. The shirt is well made with great material. It feels very comfortable and looks even better as it flows down the body. It is a silky material, but has some weight to it for cooler months. I could not find a flaw anywhere and it arrived true to size. I am very pleased with the look and feel. Definitely a shirt to wear out on the town. It looks good with dress pants or jeans.
This shirt is really well made.  The material is thick and luxurious but does get a bit hot.  I wear a large and this shirt in large is a good fit.  I'm 6" 165 lbs.

评论概述: Great looking shirt, a real attention getter.
评论详情: This shirt feels great, fits great, and is a real attention getter. If you're tired of showing up to events in the usual black or bland neutral colors, this shirt will help you try out stepping out of the box and see what it's like to get a little more attention and notice. I wear it to our senior events at church and more than one lady walked up to me and asked me where I got the shirt so they could order one for their husbands. Fits true to size and has quality workmanship.
Kinda, but I really like the feel! Nicely made shirt! I'd order more!

评论概述: Looks Fancy and Sophisticated on the Hubby
评论详情: My husband looks like the million bucks that it would have been thought to pay for this shirt, but it doesn't cost near that much but looks like otherwise. The fit is cut nicely for his masculine build, the quality of the material is nicer than most, it is very comfortable for him to wear on those long days of being in town and around people (we live quite rural and going to town does tend to be an all day deal) and it goes with various and many style types. I would say that the price of purchase is totally worth it and my husband looks fabulous wearing it.

评论概述: You will make a fashion statement.
评论详情: Pros: I got this in gold to really play up on the luxury angle and I have to warn you because while wearing this shirt you will instantly become the most stylish guy in the room.  You will look like a boss, the shirt is so well made, well designed, and well crafted that you will feel so confident in any setting while wearing this.  5/5.

评论概述: Loud shirt but it makes you stand out for sure
评论详情: Every eye looks my way when I walk in the room with this shirt on. I have never worn something that as drawn as much attention to me. The material is soft and thick. I would not necessarily say it is comfortable like a silk shirt, but it is soft. More than anything the material feels thick and quality.  In my opinion it is a little bit on the pricier side, especially because it has limited use. I can't really wear this shirt to work, or for golf, and I have not found a blazer I like with it because it has such a bold pattern. But fashion aside, this shirt is definite quality and the right wearer of this shirt will love it.
